definition: being essentially equal to something, the atomic weight of an element that has the same combining capacity as a given weight of another element
details:
adjective
- being essentially equal to something
= synonyms: tantamount
noun
- the atomic weight of an element that has the same combining capacity as a given weight of another element
= synonyms: equivalent weight, combining weight, eq
- a person or thing equal to another in value or measure or force or effect or significance etc
= example: a person or thing equal to another in value or measure or force or effect or significance etc
